amendment.description: Amendment adds a requirement to title I that the Secretary of Energy submit to Congress an annual report describing activities undertaken in the previous year, active industry participants, efforts to recruit new participants, progress of the program in meeting goals and timelines, and a strategic plan for funding of activities across agencies.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 111-255 to add a requirement to title I that the Secretary of Energy submit to Congress an annual report describing activities undertaken in the previous year, active industry participants, efforts to recruit new participants, progress of the program in meeting goals and timelines, and a strategic plan for funding of activities across agencies.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
